molecular.io.loadtxt¶

molecular.io.loadtxt(fname, glob=None, verbose=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

A refactoring of numpy.loadtxt that allows for globbing files.

Parameters

  • fname (file, str, or pathlib.Path) – Name of file.

  • glob (bool or dict) – Does fname need to be globbed? If a boolean, uses glob. If dictionary, uses vglob. (Default: None)

  • verbose (bool) – Should information about the read-in be displayed?

  • **kwargs – Optional keyword parameters to pass to numpy.loadtxt.

Returns

Read file

Return type

pandas.Series

molecular.io

Next topic
